# Changelog

### 1.2.0 (2016-09-24)

- Fix deprecation warnings with Jekyll 3.
- Add `reverse` capability.

### 1.1.1 (2015-02-27)

- Fix: Typo caused paginated collections to fail.

### 1.1.0 (2015-02-11)

- New: Configure site-wide defaults in \_config.yml

### 1.0.0 (2015-02-10)

- Initial release
